summary:
My background is in reservoir engineering with classical academic knowledge of Fluid mechanics and subsurface hydrodynamics. Aquired practical knowledge in: Petroleum Engineering, Energy Trading, Oil and Gas Field Exploration, Production, Development, Drilling, Reservoir Engineering, Front End Engineering & construction. Past ten years, I was occupied in oil & gas upstream operations, subsurface studies, implementation of integrated projects and upstream business development.

My strength is in combination of my experience in integrated subsurface knowledge base, and my skills in managing people, operations and assets. Therefore I can function either as a team leader or an individual in areas of multidisciplinary subsurface and front-end engineering studies and its construction realisation on-site, business development, integrated project management, exploration /development / production practices.

I possess of an experience in providing of “turn-key” solutions for both upstream green field development and brown field rehabilitation; and am able to manage an entire life cycle of the oil/gas field from exploration- to abandonment stage. An example of a successfully completed project was the gas-condensate production assets development project in Tomsk region (W. Siberia), where the entire subsurface and surface facilities of Ust-Silga gas-condensate field were brought “from scratch” to the delivery of the refined gas to the Gazprom’s gas pipeline system ( http://www.lngworldnews.com/alliance-oil-starts-gas-production-in-tomsk-region-russia/ ).

profile_positions.description:
SN-GD (http://en.rian.ru/business/20121016/176667298.html), located in city of Tomsk in Western Siberia, is a gas production asset of vertically integrated oil and gas holding “Alliance Oil Company”,  http://www.nk-alliance.ru/, principal investor Gazprombank.
Have full CAPEX & P&L responsibility for total exploration and development of a number of gas condensate fields "from scratch” in two license blocks: Ust-Silga, Kargasok, situated  in the North of Tomsk region, budget over US$200mln. By 3D seismic and wildcat drilling, the recoverable gas reserves, proved 17 bln m3 and probable 55 bln m3, were ascertained. Annual gas production of 700 mln m3, starts in February 2013, currently the gas first field - Ust-Silga under commissioning. Together with a consultant partner, I co-authored a unique subsurface development concept by drilling long (500m) slanted well drainages within tight Jurassic reservoir of thin, layered and folded nature, which turned to be economic. In 3 years time the following has been built and put into operation: 9 km all-the-year-round road built on swamps, 5 wildcat wells, 200 sq km 3D field seismic with interpretation, 5 slanted gas production wells (with 500 m horizontal slotted liners in Jurassic layered strata), gas processing plant (purified gas, propane-butane fraction, disel), power station for own needs, 42 km D128 inch gaspipeline to transconitinetal pipeline system of Gazprom, certified metering station. Number of employees in three years increased from 5 (at the time of license aquisition) to 53 technical, logistics, financial etc specialists. Managing a big number of outsourced exploration and development studies incl FDP, BFD, state expertise, license observance, upsurface and subsurface construction etc. Managing Purchasing/Supply Chain / Construction of facilities throughout entire project itinerary (incl PSCM, legal, negotiations, technical, economic, cost, quality etc endorsements).
